ctx: NLB in NKBM za polovico povečali dobiček
content:
Ja, in za nagrado jim bo El Baiuco podtaknil v upravo neke levake
tipa tizai/ozvaldic, ki jih bo v centralni banki potrdil egon ali
dihurček.
author: anon-110803

ctx: NLB in NKBM za polovico povečali dobiček
content:
Please consider in all your analysis of banks business result
(profit 2006/profit 2005, etc.) that the accounting standard had
changed in the year 2006 from SRS to IFRS/MRSP - because of that
the banks are doing now less provisions (reservacije) than before -
as a consequence the profit for 2006 is much higher. So the reason
is not a better performance of the banks - but lower
provisioning!!!
author: 0820HYPOX
